channel.title: CVE Feed for Xpdf -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xpdf -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3044|2023-06-02T22:32:31.677Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description:
An excessively large PDF page size (found in fuzz testing, unlikely in normal PDF files) can result in a divide-by-zero in Xpdf's text extraction code.
This is related to CVE-2022-30524, but the problem here is caused by a very large page size, rather than by a very large character coordinate.

item.title: CVE-2023-3436|2023-06-27T20:55:27.693Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: Xpdf 4.04 will deadlock on a PDF object stream whose "Length" field is itself in another object stream.

item.title: CVE-2023-2664|2023-05-11T20:21:25.821Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.04 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in the embedded file tree leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2023-2662|2023-05-11T20:08:27.720Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.04 (and earlier), a bad color space object in the input PDF file can cause a divide-by-zero.

item.title: CVE-2023-2663|2023-05-11T20:19:20.402Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.04 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in the page label tree leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-4568|2024-06-04T17:55:13.783Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.05 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in the PDF resources leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-4141|2024-06-04T17:54:17.039Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: Out-of-bounds array write in Xpdf 4.05 and earlier, triggered by an invalid character code in a Type 1 font. The root problem was a bounds check that was being optimized away by modern compilers.

item.title: CVE-2024-4976|2024-06-06T19:54:06.311Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: Out-of-bounds array write in Xpdf 4.05 and earlier, due to missing object type check in AcroForm field reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-3248|2024-04-02T23:04:40.828Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.05 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in the attachments leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-3900|2024-06-04T17:32:36.334Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: Out-of-bounds array write in Xpdf 4.05 and earlier, triggered by long Unicode sequence in ActualText.

item.title: CVE-2024-3247|2024-04-02T22:57:35.394Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: In Xpdf 4.05 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in an object stream leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2024-2971|2024-03-26T21:31:43.511Z -- xpdf -- xpdf
item.description: Out-of-bounds array write in Xpdf 4.05 and earlier, triggered by negative object number in indirect reference in the input PDF file.
